story_27_54000/2401_1101_0100_20: Remember that day in the forest?
story_27_54000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Is that a Hoopa—one of the Mythical Pokémon?!
How?!
story_27_54000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Whoooa! Not gonna lie—that’s pretty amazing,
Master Lear. Where’d you manage to find one?!
story_27_54000/2401_1001_0400_10: Hmph. Where I found it is irrelevant.
story_27_54000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Starting today, this little trickster is going to help
us ramp up the excitement for the PML!
story_27_54000/2401_1001_0600_10: Hoopa, show these two a taste of your power!
story_27_54000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I know just who to summon first—that pesky
upstart with the stupid hat! I’m going to crush that
kid on the battlefield this time!
story_27_54000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I think you may have summoned the wrong kid,
young master...
story_27_54000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I’m not ’posed to talk to strangers...
Mommy? Daddy? Where are you?
story_27_54000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Aww, shh! Don’t cry, sweetie! We’ll get you back
home to your parents right now...
